title: Alexey Ivakhnenko
summary: Alexey Ivakhnenko (Ukrainian: Олексíй Григо́рович Іва́хненко); (30 March 1913 – 16 October 2007) was a Soviet and Ukrainian mathematician most famous for developing the group method of data handling (GMDH), a method of inductive statistical learning, for which he is sometimes referred to as the "Father of deep learning".[1]
